title: why i always disconnect first game  and get punishment Low priority queue for 20 mins and 5games
body: it always happen me when i start first game for the day then i get punish like 5-10 times or more please just cancel that low priority queue for me and let me know whats wrong with it

replies.body:
You can fix this problem by constantly play games and more games you don't disconnect then your priority queue gets better 

Such as if you play like 5+ games your priority queue goes from 20mins down to 15 and so on until its over.

But I don't think Rito can dismiss it.
